Field.Name: ImportantMessageSortOrder
Field.Description: Influences the order messages are displayed in the rollup (if more than one message is being displayed). The number must be between 1 and 5, where 1 is the highest priority and 5 is the lowest.

Field.Name: HideCategoryTitleInRollup
Field.Description: If checked, the app part rollup will not display the category title in the display.

Field.Name: ImportantMessageCategory
Field.Description: Defines the type of message, which affects how it is displayed in the rollup app part.

Field.Name: ImportantMessageBody
Field.Description: Contains the content of the important message.

Field.Name: ImportantMessageStartDate
Field.Description: The date and time the message is in effect from.

Field.Name: ImportantMessageEndDate
Field.Description: The date and time the message is effective until. This date and time cannot be less than the Start Date.

ContentType.Name: Important Message
ContentType.Description: Contains an important message, along with the category of message and its effective date range.
